<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.DeferredLoader</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Loads data from xml (unload) files in the given application and directory</description> <name>DeferredLoader</name> <script><![CDATA[var DeferredLoader = Class.create();
DeferredLoader.prototype = { load: function(pluginName, dir) { GlidePluginManager.loadPluginData(pluginName, dir); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2008-02-15 19:15:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1e83647b0a0a0b18004216838e4344e2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DeferredLoader</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">5113bc203c31311068bcf327dfe37f8c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e83647b0a0a0b18004216838e4344e2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>aleck.lin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2013-08-22 01:35:37</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
